newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Creative in venture for high-speed modem.
newsitem.headline: Creative in venture for high-speed modem.

text.p: Multi-media company Creative Technology Ltd said on Tuesday it has signed an agreement to form a strategic alliance with Rockwell Semiconductor Systems Inc.

Creative and Rockwell intend to develop, supply and market high-speed communications products including 56 kilobits-per-second modems annd video conferencing solutions to the original equipment manufacturers (OEM) and retail markets.

Creative and Rockwell will also begin working together on joint marketing and development activities that combine Rockwell's expertise in VLSI-based solutions for multimedia communications with Creative's expertise in developing and distributing integrated multimedia products for home and office users.
